level.heading: Report of enrollments and withdrawals.
level.text: The principal or head teacher of each public, independent, private, or parochial school, and each teacher who gives private instruction, shall, in accordance with the rules adopted by the Board pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, report to the Board the name, address, sex, and date of birth of each minor who resides permanently or temporarily in the District who transfers between schools or who enrolls in or withdraws from his or her school.

level.heading: History
level.text: (Feb. 4, 1925, 43 Stat. 807, ch. 140, Art. II, § 2; renumbered as Art. II, § 4 and amended, Mar. 8, 1991, D.C. Law 8-247, § 2(a), 38 DCR 376.)

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 8-247
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-247, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 38-201.
